Name: Fast Zombie Apparition
UserPrompt: spawn 20 fast zombies (npc_fastzombie) directly in front of the player all in the same spot, all playing the fast zombie charging sound (npc/fast_zombie/fz_scream1.wav) for about 80 ms and delete them, stopping the sounds immediately too, (stopsound in console).
ExecutionCode:
_G.ScareZombies = _G.ScareZombies or {}

local ply = Entity(1)
if IsValid(ply) then
    local spawnPos = ply:EyePos() + ply:GetForward() * 50
    spawnPos.z = ply:GetPos().z -- Keep them on the same floor level as player mostly
    
    for i=1, 20 do
        local z = ents.Create("npc_fastzombie")
        if IsValid(z) then
            z:SetPos(spawnPos)
            z:SetAngles((ply:GetPos() - spawnPos):Angle())
            z:Spawn()
            z:Activate()
            z:SetHealth(1) -- Just in case
            -- Make them perform the scream
            z:EmitSound("npc/fast_zombie/fz_scream1.wav", 100, 100)
            table.insert(_G.ScareZombies, z)
        end
    end

    timer.Create("FastZombieScareCleanup", 0.08, 1, function()
        if _G.ScareZombies then
            for _, v in pairs(_G.ScareZombies) do
                if IsValid(v) then v:Remove() end
            end
            _G.ScareZombies = {}
        end
        RunOnClient[[ RunConsoleCommand("stopsound") ]]
    end)
end
UndoCode:
timer.Remove("FastZombieScareCleanup")
if _G.ScareZombies then
    for _, v in pairs(_G.ScareZombies) do
        if IsValid(v) then v:Remove() end
    end
    _G.ScareZombies = {}
end
RunOnClient[[ RunConsoleCommand("stopsound") ]]
